description:
The apt is a second floor walkup just two blocks from Washington Square Park, meaning you're close to tons of bars, restaurants and shops. I'll be available to greet you and provide the keys, as well as any recommendations you need. Bed linens will be provided (but bringing towels is suggested). It's just four blocks from west 4th street subway station (ACEFM trains).

Four blocks from West 4th Street Station (ACEFM trains) and a 10 min walk to the 1 train or the Path train (to Jersey).
name: Great apt near Washington Square Park
review: If you'r wanting to stay in the Village for a very reasonable proce, this is the place. We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go.
